item.title: Math Review Sessions
item.description: Get your child ready for the new school year with math review sessions!

item.title: Summer Coding and Math Camps
item.description: Coding and math camp in the last week of July and the first two weeks of August.

item.title: Summer Break
item.description: Blue Ridge Boost will be closed from June 5th to July 23rd.

item.title: Free trial coding classes
item.description: Open house every Sunday at 1 pm!

item.title: The new office is ready for students!
New Downtown Location
item.description: Starting in September, Blue Ridge Boost is located at 222 Court Square, Charlottesville. To reach us, please walk around to the back of the building. Walk up the stairs to the second floor and enter through the door on your left. The closest paid parking is the Market Street Garage. Free 2-hour parking is available throughout the Downtown area.
